data.latitude: Latitude. Set as 0 to use current location
data.longitude: Longitude. Set as 0 to use current location
data.mode: Forecast mode for the Weather entity
data.name: Integration Name
data.forecast: Daily forecasts sensors in csv form from 0-7 (ex. '0,1,3'). Only used if sensors are requested.
data.hourly_forecast: Hourly forecast sensors in csv form from 0-168 (ex. '0,1,10'). Only used if sensors are requested.
data.monitored_conditions: Monitored conditions to create sensors for. Only used if sensors are requested.
data.pw_platform: Weather Entity and/or Sensor Entity. Sensor will create entities for each condition at each time. If unsure, only select Weather!
data.pw_round: Round values to the nearest integer. Ensure that the selected units match the system units.
data.scan_interval: Seconds to wait between updates. Reducing this below 900 seconds (15 minutes) is not recomended.
data.endpoint: Endpoint to use dev or local source, with https://. Default is https://api.pirateweather.net
